title: Max Payne 1 & 2 Remakes Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.07.22
description:
Tam and Tim reunite for another Tim Tam Thursday to talk Remedy, Max Payne, Riot, Deus Ex, and more! 

Follow Tam on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tamoorh

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now with us recapping our weekend at Achievement Hunter Live.
The Roper Report  -
00:09:00 - Activision QA Gets a Big Win!
00:12:14 - Remedy Is Remaking Max Payne 1 And 2
00:18:52 - Riot Games Tells Workers to Return to Office Without Vaccine or Mask Requirements
00:26:50 - Canned Deus Ex Movie Script Changed A Major Aspect Of The Game
00:34:14 - Ads
00:37:00 - You Can Now Switch TV Inputs With Your Xbox Controller
00:42:22 - Epic and Lego partner to build a metaverse for kids
00:50:37 - Out today
00:54:49 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Andy
